verses.verse: וַיַּגִּ֥דוּ <WH5046> Then they told לְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> David לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> Behold the Philistines נִלְחָמִ֣ים <WH3898> fight בִּקְעִילָ֔ה <WH7084> against Keilah וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> and are שֹׁסִ֥ים <WH8154> and they rob אֶת־ <WH853> הַגֳּרָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1637> the threshingfloors

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <WH7592> enquired דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> Therefore David בַּֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הַאֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> go וְהִכֵּ֔יתִי <WH5221> and smite בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> the Philistines הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these ס וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> unto David לֵ֚ךְ <WH1980> Go וְהִכִּ֣יתָ <WH5221> and smite בַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> the Philistines וְהוֹשַׁעְתָּ֖ <WH3467> and save אֶת־ <WH853> קְעִילָֽה׃ <WH7084> Keilah

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> said אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> men דָוִד֙ <WH1732> And David's אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> against הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> we פֹ֛ה <WH6311> here בִּֽיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> here in Judah יְרֵאִ֑ים <WH3372> are afraid וְאַף֙ <WH637> How כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if נֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> go קְעִלָ֔ה <WH7084> to Keilah אֶל־ <WH413> against מַֽעַרְכ֖וֹת <WH4634> against the armies פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> Philistine ס

וַיּ֨וֹסֶף <WH3254> yet again ע֤וֹד <WH5750> Then דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> Then David לִשְׁאֹ֣ל <WH7592> enquired בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD ס וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֖הוּ <WH6030> answered יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> And the LORD וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> him and said ק֚וּם <WH6965> Arise רֵ֣ד <WH3381> go down קְעִילָ֔ה <WH7084> to Keilah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I נֹתֵ֛ן <WH5414> for I will deliver אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> the Philistines בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> into thine hand

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went דָּוִד֩ <WH1732> So David [וַאִנְשֹׁו כ] (וַאֲנָשָׁ֨יו <WH376> he ק) קְעִילָ֜ה <WH7084> to Keilah וַיִּלָּ֣חֶם <WH3898> and fought בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> with the Philistines וַיִּנְהַג֙ <WH5090> and brought away אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4735> their cattle וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> and smote בָּהֶ֖ם מַכָּ֣ה <WH4347> slaughter גְדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> them with a great וַיֹּ֣שַׁע <WH3467> saved דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> So David אֵ֖ת <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> the inhabitants קְעִילָֽה׃ <WH7084> of Keilah ס

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בִּ֠בְרֹחַ <WH1272> fled אֶבְיָתָ֧ר <WH54> And it came to pass when Abiathar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִימֶ֛לֶךְ <WH288> of Ahimelech אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> to David קְעִילָ֑ה <WH7084> to Keilah אֵפ֖וֹד <WH646> [with] an ephod יָרַ֥ד <WH3381> [that] he came down בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> in his hand

וַיֻּגַּ֣ד <WH5046> And it was told לְשָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> Saul כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֥א <WH935> was come דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> that David קְעִילָ֑ה <WH7084> to Keilah וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> And Saul נִכַּ֨ר <WH5234> hath delivered אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God בְּיָדִ֔י <WH3027> him into mine hand כִּ֚י <WH3588> for נִסְגַּ֣ר <WH5462> for he is shut in לָב֔וֹא <WH935> by entering בְּעִ֖יר <WH5892> into a town דְּלָתַ֥יִם <WH1817> that hath gates וּבְרִֽיחַ׃ <WH1280> and bars

וַיְשַׁמַּ֥ע <WH8085> together שָׁא֛וּל <WH7586> And Saul אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> all the people לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to war לָרֶ֣דֶת <WH3381> to go down קְעִילָ֔ה <WH7084> to Keilah לָצ֥וּר <WH6696> to besiege אֶל־ <WH413> about דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> David וְאֶל־ <WH413> and אֲנָשָֽׁיו׃ <WH376> his men

וַיֵּ֣דַע <WH3045> knew דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> against שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> that Saul מַחֲרִ֣ישׁ <WH2790> secretly practised הָרָעָ֑ה <WH7451> mischief וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> against him and he said אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶבְיָתָ֣ר <WH54> to Abiathar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest הַגִּ֖ישָׁה <WH5066> Bring hither הָאֵפֽוֹד׃ <WH646> the ephod ס

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> Then said דָּוִד֒ <WH1732> David יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel שָׁמֹ֤עַ <WH8085> hath certainly שָׁמַע֙ <WH8085> heard עַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> thy servant כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> seeketh שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> that Saul לָב֣וֹא <WH935> to come אֶל־ <WH413> to קְעִילָ֑ה <WH7084> to Keilah לְשַׁחֵ֥ת <WH7843> to destroy לָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city בַּעֲבוּרִֽי׃ <WH5668> my account

הֲיַסְגִּרֻ֣נִי <WH5462> deliver me up בַעֲלֵי֩ <WH1167> Will the men קְעִילָ֨ה <WH7084> of Keilah בְיָד֜וֹ <WH3027> able הֲיֵרֵ֣ד <WH3381> come down שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> Saul כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> hath שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> hath heard עַבְדֶּ֔ךָ <WH5650> as thy servant יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> ? O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הַגֶּד־ <WH5046> I beseech thee tell נָ֖א <WH4994> pray לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> thy servant ס וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD יֵרֵֽד׃ <WH3381> He will come down

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David הֲיַסְגִּ֜רוּ <WH5462> deliver בַּעֲלֵ֧י <WH1167> Will the men קְעִילָ֛ה <WH7084> of Keilah אֹתִ֥י <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲנָשַׁ֖י <WH376> and my men בְּיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> Saul וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Jehovah יַסְגִּֽירוּ׃ <WH5462> They will deliver [thee] up ס

וַיָּקָם֩ <WH6965> arose דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> Then David וַאֲנָשָׁ֜יו <WH376> and his men כְּשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> [which were] about six מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> and his men וַיֵּצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> and departed מִקְּעִלָ֔ה <WH7084> out of Keilah וַיִּֽתְהַלְּכ֖וּ <WH1980> and went בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whithersoever יִתְהַלָּ֑כוּ <WH1980> they could go וּלְשָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> Saul הֻגַּ֗ד <WH5046> And it was told כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִמְלַ֤ט <WH4422> was escaped דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> that David מִקְּעִילָ֔ה <WH7084> from Keilah וַיֶּחְדַּ֖ל <WH2308> and he forbare לָצֵֽאת׃ <WH3318> to go forth

וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <WH3427> abode דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> And David בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> in the wilderness בַּמְּצָד֔וֹת <WH4679> in strong holds וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> and remained בָּהָ֖ר <WH2022> in a mountain בְּמִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> in the wilderness זִ֑יף <WH2128> of Ziph וַיְבַקְשֵׁ֤הוּ <WH1245> sought שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> And Saul כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> him every day וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not נְתָנ֥וֹ <WH5414> delivered אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> but God בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> him not into his hand

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָצָ֥א <WH3318> was come out שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> that Saul לְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> his life וְדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> and David בְּמִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> [was] in the wilderness זִ֖יף <WH2128> of Ziph בַּחֹֽרְשָׁה׃ <WH2793> in a wood ס

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> arose יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <WH3083> And Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> son שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> Saul's וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> to David חֹ֑רְשָׁה <WH2793> into the wood וַיְחַזֵּ֥ק <WH2388> and strengthened אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand בֵּאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> in God

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֗א <WH3372> unto him Fear כִּ֠י <WH3588> because לֹ֤א <WH3808> will not תִֽמְצָאֲךָ֙ <WH4672> shall not find יַ֚ד <WH3027> not for the hand שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> of Saul אָבִ֔י <WH1> my father וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> and you תִּמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> thee and thou shalt be king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over Israel וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I אֶֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לְּךָ֣ לְמִשְׁנֶ֑ה <WH4932> and I shall be next וְגַם־ <WH1571> also שָׁא֥וּל <WH7586> unto thee and that also Saul אָבִ֖י <WH1> my father יֹדֵ֥עַ <WH3045> knoweth כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> of them

וַיִּכְרְת֧וּ <WH3772> made שְׁנֵיהֶ֛ם <WH8147> And they two בְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> a covenant לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> abode דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> and David בַּחֹ֔רְשָׁה <WH2793> in the wood וִיהוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3083> and Jonathan הָלַ֥ךְ <WH1980> went לְבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> to his house ס

וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <WH5927> Then came up זִפִים֙ <WH2130> the Ziphites אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> to Saul הַגִּבְעָ֖תָה <WH1390> to Gibeah לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not דָ֠וִד <WH1732> Doth not David מִסְתַּתֵּ֨ר <WH5641> hide עִמָּ֤נוּ <WH5973> in בַמְּצָדוֹת֙ <WH4679> himself with us in strong holds בַּחֹ֔רְשָׁה <WH2793> in the wood בְּגִבְעַת֙ <WH1389> in the hill הַֽחֲכִילָ֔ה <WH2444> of Hachilah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which מִימִ֥ין <WH3225> which [is] on the south הַיְשִׁימֽוֹן׃ <WH3452> desert

וְ֠עַתָּה <WH6258> Now לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all אַוַּ֨ת <WH185> according to all the desire נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <WH5315> of thy soul הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> Now therefore O king לָרֶ֖דֶת <WH3381> come down רֵ֑ד <WH3381> to come down וְלָ֥נוּ הַסְגִּיר֖וֹ <WH5462> and our part [shall be] to deliver בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> him into the king's

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> And Saul בְּרוּכִ֥ים <WH1288> Blessed אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [be] ye of the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חֲמַלְתֶּ֖ם <WH2550> for ye have compassion עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and

לְכוּ־ <WH1980> Go נָ֞א <WH4994> now הָכִ֣ינוּ <WH3559> I pray you prepare ע֗וֹד <WH5750> more וּדְע֤וּ <WH3045> yet and know וּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> and see אֶת־ <WH853> מְקוֹמוֹ֙ <WH4725> his place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after תִּֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become רַגְל֔וֹ <WH7272> where his haunt מִ֥י <WH4310> is who רָאָ֖הוּ <WH7200> is [and] who hath seen שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אָמַ֣ר <WH559> him there for it is told אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about עָר֥וֹם <WH6191> me [that] he dealeth very יַעְרִ֖ם <WH6196> chestnut tree הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וּרְא֣וּ <WH7200> See וּדְע֗וּ <WH3045> therefore and take knowledge מִכֹּ֤ל <WH3605> all הַמַּֽחֲבֹאִים֙ <WH4224> of all the lurking places אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he יִתְחַבֵּ֣א <WH2244> where he hideth שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> in it וְשַׁבְתֶּ֤ם <WH7725> himself and come ye again אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> to me נָכ֔וֹן <WH3559> to me with the certainty וְהָלַכְתִּ֖י <WH1980> and I will go אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> for וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become אִם־ <WH518> and if יֶשְׁנ֣וֹ <WH3426> with you and it shall come to pass if he be בָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land וְחִפַּשְׂתִּ֣י <WH2664> that I will search אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all אַלְפֵ֥י <WH505> him out throughout all the thousands יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַיָּק֛וּמוּ <WH6965> And they arose וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> and went זִ֖יפָה <WH2128> to Ziph לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> Saul וְדָוִ֨ד <WH1732> but David וַאֲנָשָׁ֜יו <WH376> and his men בְּמִדְבַּ֤ר <WH4057> [were] in the wilderness מָעוֹן֙ <WH4584> of Maon בָּעֲרָבָ֔ה <WH6160> in the plain אֶ֖ל <WH413> to יְמִ֥ין <WH3225> on the south הַיְשִׁימֽוֹן׃ <WH3452> of Jeshimon

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> Saul וַאֲנָשָׁיו֮ <WH376> and his men לְבַקֵּשׁ֒ <WH1245> to seek וַיַּגִּ֣דוּ <WH5046> [him] And they told לְדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> David וַיֵּ֣רֶד <WH3381> wherefore he came down הַסֶּ֔לַע <WH5553> into a rock וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> and abode בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> in the wilderness מָע֑וֹן <WH4584> of Maon וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> And when Saul וַיִּרְדֹּ֥ף <WH7291> [that] he pursued אַחֲרֵֽי־ <WH310> after דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> David מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> in the wilderness מָעֽוֹן׃ <WH4584> of Maon

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> And Saul מִצַּ֤ד <WH6654> on this side הָהָר֙ <WH2022> of the mountain מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> one וְדָוִ֧ד <WH1732> and David וַאֲנָשָׁ֛יו <WH376> and his men מִצַּ֥ד <WH6654> on that side הָהָ֖ר <WH2022> of the mountain מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> the other וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> become דָוִ֜ד <WH1732> and David נֶחְפָּ֤ז <WH2648> made haste לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> to get מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> for fear שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul וְשָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> for Saul וַאֲנָשָׁ֗יו <WH376> and his men עֹֽטְרִ֛ים <WH5849> round about אֶל־ <WH413> about דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> David וְאֶל־ <WH413> and אֲנָשָׁ֖יו <WH376> his men לְתָפְשָֽׂם׃ <WH8610> to take

וּמַלְאָ֣ךְ <WH4397> a messenger בָּ֔א <WH935> But there came אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> unto Saul לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מַהֲרָ֣ה <WH4116> Haste וְלֵ֔כָה <WH1980> and come כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פָשְׁט֥וּ <WH6584> have invaded פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> for the Philistines עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land

וַיָּ֣שָׁב <WH7725> returned שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> Wherefore Saul מִרְדֹף֙ <WH7291> from pursuing אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> David וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and went לִקְרַ֣את <WH7122> to meet פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> the Philistines עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that קָֽרְאוּ֙ <WH7121> therefore they called לַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> that place הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he סֶ֖לַע הַֽמַּחְלְקֽוֹת׃ <WH5555> Selahammahlekoth
וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> went up דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> And David מִשָּׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> from thence and dwelt בִּמְצָד֥וֹת <WH4679> in strong holds עֵֽין־ גֶּֽדִי׃ <WH5872> at Engedi
